name: JumpyJumpy
description:
This game was made in about 2h05 with the goal of understanding a bit better how Unity works by starting a project without any tutorial.

Making of here

The gameplay is pretty straightforward, jump from platform to platform until you're at the end. There are 2 platforms on which your progression will be saved; You'll be teleported back to those if you fall over.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys : Move around

Space : Jump

R : Teleports you to the latest save point
